comments.body: are you sure about `label`. Its not there in our es6-promise lib : https://github.com/borisyankov/DefinitelyTyped/blob/master/es6-promises/es6-promises.d.ts#L23 which is a part of the RSVP collection of libs + I don't see it here : http://emberjs.com/api/classes/Ember.RSVP.Promise.html

@basarat  Yeah, you can see it here: https://github.com/emberjs/ember.js/blob/v1.5.0/packages/rsvp/lib/main.js#L1051 or by logging the function signature for `Ember.RSVP.Promise` in the console. Although it's not advertised in the example, it seems to be thoroughly used in the source (if specified).
